## Temu scraping




```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(ggplot2)
url<-"https://www.amazon.com/s?k=3090&crid=2CRFKFD2NPXO4&sprefix=3090%2Caps%2C185&ref=nb_sb_noss_1"

# 
# The results from the search will be of the form:
# 
path = ".a-link-normal.s-underline-text.s-underline-link-text.s-link-style.a-text-normal"
results <- read_html(url) %>% 
  html_nodes(path) %>% 
  html_attr("href")

results
```
